tickets.ticket_summary: Customer's flight was cancelled due to weather conditions. Needs urgent rebooking for connecting international flight.
tickets.email_body: Hello, my flight from JFK to LAX (AA123) was just cancelled due to weather. I have a connecting flight to Tokyo in 4 hours. This is extremely urgent as I have a business meeting tomorrow morning. Please help me get rebooked on the next available flight. My booking reference is ABC123.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer requesting refund due to medical emergency preventing travel.
tickets.email_body: I was scheduled to fly from SFO to NYC tomorrow (Flight #DL456), but I've been hospitalized due to an emergency appendectomy. I've attached my medical documentation. I need to request a full refund as I won't be able to travel for at least 2 weeks. My booking reference is XYZ789.

tickets.ticket_title: Mobile App Not Working - Can't Check In
tickets.ticket_summary: Customer unable to check in through mobile app, flight in 2 hours.
tickets.email_subject: URGENT: App Not Working - Flight in 2 Hours
tickets.email_body: I'm trying to check in for my flight from ORD to MIA (Flight #UA789) but your mobile app keeps crashing. I've tried reinstalling it but no luck. My flight is in 2 hours and I need to check in. Please help! Booking reference: DEF456

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer's luggage didn't make connecting flight, contains important business documents.
tickets.email_body: I flew from LHR to JFK (Flight #BA123) and then to SFO (Flight #AA456). My luggage didn't make the connection and contains important business documents. The tracking number is LHR123456. Please help locate it urgently.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer requesting wheelchair assistance for upcoming flight.
tickets.email_body: I need wheelchair assistance for my flight from ATL to SEA (Flight #DL789) on April 25th. I've recently had knee surgery and can't walk long distances. My booking reference is GHI789. Please confirm the assistance has been arranged.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer requesting upgrade to business class for upcoming flight.
tickets.email_body: I'm flying from DFW to LHR (Flight #UA123) next week and would like to upgrade to business class. I'm a frequent flyer (Member #123456) and have enough miles. Please let me know the upgrade options and cost.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer requesting compensation for significant flight delay.
tickets.email_body: My flight from MIA to EWR (Flight #AA789) was delayed by 8 hours due to mechanical issues. This caused me to miss an important business meeting. I'm requesting compensation as per your policy. Booking reference: JKL123

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer experiencing technical issues while trying to book a flight.
tickets.email_body: I'm trying to book a flight from BOS to SFO but keep getting an error when trying to process payment. The error message says 'Payment Gateway Error'. I've tried multiple cards and browsers. Please help resolve this issue.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer requesting information about traveling with a pet.
tickets.email_body: I'm planning to travel with my dog from SEA to HNL (Flight #DL123) next month. I need information about the required documentation, carrier specifications, and any additional fees. My dog is a 15lb Shih Tzu.

tickets.ticket_summary: Customer needs to update emergency contact information for upcoming flight.
tickets.email_subject: URGENT: Update Emergency Contact - Flight Tomorrow
tickets.email_body: I need to update my emergency contact information for my flight tomorrow from ORD to LAX (Flight #UA456). My previous contact is no longer available. Booking reference: MNO456
